text: "Pirate" is a song recorded by American singer and actress Cher, released as the first single from her 14th album Cherished (1977). The song debuted at #96 on the Billboard Hot 100 on the issue date of January 15, peaking at #93 the following week. ==Weekly charts== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !Chart (1977) !Peak position |- |align="left"|US Billboard Hot 100 |align="center"|93 |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:1977 singles Category:1977 songs Category:Cher songs Category:Warner Records singles Category:Songs written by Steve Dorff Category:Song recordings produced by Snuff Garrett
title: Pirate (Cher song)
